events.desc: Fired when the spreadsheet's cell information is available.

jsdoc.description: Fired when the spreadsheet's cell information is available.

tags.name: detail.data
tags.description: The data returned by the Spreadsheet API.

tags.name: detail.type
tags.description: The type of data that was fetched. One of 'spreadsheets', 'tab', 'rows' to correspond to the feed type.

events.name: google-sheet-data

params.desc: The data returned by the Spreadsheet API.
params.name: detail.data

params.desc: The type of data that was fetched. One of 'spreadsheets', 'tab', 'rows' to correspond to the feed type.
params.name: detail.type

properties.name: clientId
properties.desc: A Google Developers client ID. Obtain from [console.developers.google.com](https://console.developers.google.com). Required for accessing a private spreadsheet. Optional if accessing a public spreadsheet.

properties.name: key
properties.desc:
The key of the spreadsheet. This can be found in the URL when viewing
the document is Google Docs (e.g. `docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=<KEY>`).

Leaving off this attribute still returns a list of the users spreadsheets in the `spreadsheets` property.

properties.name: openInGoogleDocsUrl
properties.desc: The URL to open this spreadsheet in Google Sheets.

properties.name: published
properties.desc:
A hint that the spreadsheet is published publicly in Google Docs. Used as a performance optimization.
Make sure the sheet is also publicly viewable by anyone in the Share settings.

properties.name: rows
properties.desc: If a spreadsheet `key` is specified, returns a list of cell row data.

properties.name: sheet
properties.desc: The fetched sheet corresponding to the `key` attribute.

properties.name: spreadsheets
properties.desc: List of the user's spreadsheets. Shared across instances.

properties.name: tab
properties.desc: Meta data about the particular tab that was retrieved for the spreadsheet.

properties.name: tabId
properties.desc:
Tab within a spreadsheet. For example, the first tab in a spreadsheet
would be `tab-id="1"`.
